text: 160 people have been killed and hundreds
more have been injured in a series of
explosions at churches and hotels in Sri
Lanka it's now being reported that there
have been 8 separate explosions across
the country all targeting churches and
hotels the attacks on churches took
place in the country's biggest city
Colombo as well as in the gumbo and the
eastern city of Batak alone at least 67
people are thought to have died in the
attack on st. Sebastian's Church in the
gumbo the hotel's attacks were also in
Colombo they include the 5-star
shangri-la cinnamon ground and Kingsbury
hotels people were attending Easter Mass
in the churches when the explosions went
off Sri Lanka's Prime Minister has
condemned what he called a cowardly
attack and the nationwide curfew has
been imposed the government says 9
foreign nationals are among the dead
